item.title: Report X-2024111018
item.description:
Report X-2024111018

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-28T06:19:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-19
  • City: ATLANTA
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment leaked due to insufficient tap on the bottom of the box. The box broke open from the bottom when it was picked up by an employee. The inner contents (plastic bottles) fell out of the box, damaging one (top came off). 4 Plastic bottles at 4L each. Product info: Rite Kem Stainless Steel Maintainer Concentrated. The shipment was placed in a salvage drum and held pending disposition from the shipper.
